keepAwakeEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be kept awake during active hours.

autoStartEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether the Dev Box should be automatically started at commencement of active hours.

defaultTimeZone.description: The default IANA timezone id of the active hours.

defaultStartTimeHour.description: The default start time of the active hours.

defaultEndTimeHour.description: The default end time of the active hours.

defaultDaysOfWeek.description: The days of the week that active hours features will be enabled. This serves as a default that can be updated by each individual user.

daysOfWeekLimit.description: The maximum amount of days per week that a user can enable active hours related features.

properties.description: Properties of an allowed environment type.

value.description: The AllowedEnvironmentType items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

displayName.description: The display name of the allowed environment type.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

networkConnectionId.description: The resource ID of the NetworkConnection you want to attach.

networkConnectionLocation.description: The geo-location where the NetworkConnection resource specified in 'networkConnectionResourceId' property lives.

domainJoinType.description: AAD Join type of the network. This is populated based on the referenced Network Connection.

value.description: The AttachedNetworkConnection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AutoImageBuildStatus.description: Indicates whether auto image build is enabled/disabled.

AutoStartEnableStatus.description: Enables or disables whether Dev Boxes should be automatically started at commencement of active hours.

AzureAiServicesMode.description: Indicates whether Azure AI services are enabled for a project.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Azure AI services are disabled for this project.

values.name: AutoDeploy
values.description: Azure AI services are enabled for this project and necessary resources will be automatically setup.

AzureAiServicesSettings.description: Configures Azure AI related services for the project.

azureAiServicesMode.description: The property indicates whether Azure AI services is enabled.

Capability.description: A name/value pair to describe a capability.

value.description: Value of the capability.

path.description: The path of the file that has a conflicting name.

name.description: Name of the conflicting catalog item.

CatalogConnectionState.description: The connection state of the catalog.

CatalogItemSyncEnableStatus.description: Catalog item sync types enable or disable status. Indicates whether project catalogs are allowed to sync catalog items under projects associated to this dev center.

value.description: The Catalog items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

syncState.description: The synchronization state of the catalog.

connectionState.description: The connection state of the catalog.

lastConnectionTime.description: When the catalog was last connected.

lastSyncTime.description: When the catalog was last synced.

CatalogResourceValidationErrorDetails.description: List of validator error details. Populated when changes are made to the resource or its dependent resources that impact the validity of the Catalog resource.

errors.description: Errors associated with resources synchronized from the catalog.

path.description: The path of the file the error is associated with.

CatalogSyncState.description: The synchronization state of the catalog.

CatalogSyncType.description: Indicates the type of sync that is configured for the catalog.

CatalogUpdate.description: The catalog's properties for partial update. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

CatalogUpdateProperties.description: Properties of a catalog. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

gitHub.description: Properties for a GitHub catalog type.

adoGit.description: Properties for an Azure DevOps catalog type.

syncType.description: Indicates the type of sync that is configured for the catalog.

CheckScopedNameAvailabilityRequest.description: The scoped name check availability request body.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

scope.description: The resource id to scope the name check.

CmkIdentityType.description: The type of identity used to access the key vault key.

CustomizationTask.description: Represents a Task to be used in customizing a Dev Box.

required.description: Whether or not the input is required.

values.name: string
values.description: The parameter accepts a string value.

values.name: number
values.description: The parameter accepts a number value.

values.name: boolean
values.description: The parameter accepts a boolean value.

displayName.description: Display name to help differentiate multiple instances of the same task.

timeoutInSeconds.description: Timeout, in seconds. Overrides any timeout provided on the task definition.

condition.description: An expression that must evaluate to true in order for the task to run.

value.description: The CustomizationTask items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

timeout.description: The default timeout for the task.

value.description: value of the parameter.

DevBoxAutoDeleteSettings.description: Settings controlling the auto deletion of inactive dev boxes.

deleteMode.description: Indicates the delete mode for Dev Boxes within this project.

inactiveThreshold.description: ISO8601 duration required for the dev box to not be inactive prior to it being scheduled for deletion.  ISO8601 format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S.

gracePeriod.description: ISO8601 duration required for the dev box to be marked for deletion prior to it being deleted. ISO8601 format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S.

DevBoxDefinition.description: Represents a definition for a Developer Machine.

value.description: The DevBoxDefinition items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DevBoxDefinitionProperties.description: Properties of a Dev Box definition.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

imageValidationStatus.description: Validation status of the configured image.

imageValidationErrorDetails.description: Details for image validator error. Populated when the image validation is not successful.

validationStatus.description: Validation status for the Dev Box Definition.

activeImageReference.description: Image reference information for the currently active image (only populated during updates).

DevBoxDefinitionUpdate.description: Partial update of a Dev Box definition resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

properties.description: Properties of a Dev Box definition to be updated.

DevBoxDefinitionUpdateProperties.description: Properties of a Dev Box definition. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

sku.description: The SKU for Dev Boxes created using this definition.

osStorageType.description: The storage type used for the Operating System disk of Dev Boxes created using this definition.

hibernateSupport.description: Indicates whether Dev Boxes created with this definition are capable of hibernation. Not all images are capable of supporting hibernation. To find out more see https://aka.ms/devbox/hibernate

DevBoxDeleteMode.description: Indicates possible values for Dev Box delete mode.

values.name: Manual
values.description: Dev Boxes will not be deleted automatically, and user must manually delete. This is the default.

values.name: Auto
values.description: Dev Boxes will be deleted automatically according to configured settings.

DevBoxProvisioningSettings.description: Provisioning settings that apply to all Dev Boxes created in this dev center.

installAzureMonitorAgentEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether to install the Azure Monitor Agent service on Dev Boxes that belong to this dev center

DevBoxTunnelEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether Dev Box Tunnel is enabled.

devboxDisksEncryptionEnableStatus.description: Devbox disk encryption enable or disable status. Indicates if Devbox disks encryption using DevCenter CMK is enabled or not.

keyEncryptionKeyUrl.description: Key encryption key Url, versioned or non-versioned. Ex: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek/562a4bb76b524a1493a6afe8e536ee78 or https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek.

keyEncryptionKeyIdentity.description: The managed identity configuration used for key vault access.

microsoftHostedNetworkEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether pools in this Dev Center can use Microsoft Hosted Networks. Defaults to Enabled if not set.

catalogItemSyncEnableStatus.description: Whether project catalogs associated with projects in this dev center can be configured to sync catalog items.

devCenterUri.description: The URI of the Dev Center.

resourceType.description: The name of the resource type.

networkSettings.description: Network settings that will be enforced on network resources associated with the Dev Center.
